author: Reuters Editorial
title: Harley-Davidson CEO's 2017 Total Compensation Was $11.12 Mln
text:
March 29 (Reuters) - Harley-Davidson Inc:
* HARLEY-DAVIDSON INC SAYS CEO MATTHEW S. LEVATICH’S 2017 TOTAL COMPENSATION WAS $11.12 MILLION VERSUS $9.35 MILLION IN 2016 – SEC FILING ‍​
* HARLEY-DAVIDSON INC SAYS CFO JOHN A. OLIN'S 2017 TOTAL COMPENSATION WAS $4.2 MILLION VERSUS $4.9 MILLION IN 2016 – SEC FILING ‍​ Source text ( bit.ly/2pP4PQF ) Further company coverage:
